# thirdeye
Fair Volatility Estimate Model

# Install

```bash
git clone https://github.com/drillan/thirdeye.git
cd thirdeye
python setup.py install
```

# sample

* 1-D array(list, tupple, numpy.array, pandas.Series)
```python
import third_eye

low_price = [1116.560059, 1129.660034, 1133.949951, 1131.319946, 1136.219971,
             1142.02002, 1131.77002, 1133.180054, 1143.800049, 1131.390015,
             1135.77002, 1129.25, 1114.839966, 1090.180054, 1092.400024,
             1089.859985, 1083.109985, 1078.459961, 1071.589966, 1073.890015]

high_price = [1133.869995, 1136.630005, 1139.189941, 1142.459961, 1145.390015,
              1149.73999, 1143.810059, 1148.400024, 1150.410034, 1147.77002,
              1150.449951, 1147.949951, 1141.579956, 1115.48999, 1102.969971,
              1103.689941, 1099.51001, 1100.219971, 1096.449951, 1089.380005]

close_price = [1132.98999, 1136.52002, 1137.140015, 1141.689941, 1144.97998,
               1146.97998, 1136.219971, 1145.680054, 1148.459961, 1136.030029,
               1150.22998, 1138.040039, 1116.47998, 1091.76001, 1096.780029,
               1092.170044, 1097.5, 1084.530029, 1073.869995, 1089.189941]

third_eye.get_TE(low_price, high_price, close_price, 0.9, 5)
```

```
array([        nan,         nan,         nan,         nan,         nan,
               nan,         nan,  0.12636247,  0.09903344,  0.14380201,
        0.15735619,  0.19814198,  0.23494508,  0.27529154,  0.22273778,
        0.16930819,  0.14852392,  0.18772948,  0.18027467,  0.18896796])
```

* DataFrame
```python
import thirdeye
from pandas_datareader.data import DataReader

df = DataReader('^GSPC', 'yahoo')
thirdeye.get_TE_from_df(df.iloc[-200:], 0.9, 11)
```
